name: Scheele's Green
description: Scheele’s Green is an interactive fiction, containing various endings depending on the player’s choices. The content is based on a mixture of the reality we face and the fantasy we’ve created. The main character is not satisfied with their life, they happened to find out about the “Almighty Wizard”, who can fix every issue in their life. Therefore, the main character starts the journey to the “Green Castle”. Through the journey, they can meet lots of different characters and make their own decisions. The responsibility for consequences is on the player. We aim to deliver the mentality of young adults trying to navigate through life; lost, unstable, desperate yet hopeful.
